name: Apple Bacon Wraps
author: ApronFan
summary: Apple, bacon, and deli meat wrapped in a tortilla. This recipe is the invention of the resourcefulness of my husband and a family favorite.
ingredients: 1  Granny Smith apple, cut into thin bite-size pieces
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Place a tortilla on a work surface and drizzle 1 tablespoon honey down the middle of the tortilla; top with 3 bacon pieces
Layer 2 tablespoons Cheddar cheese over bacon and top with 2 slices ham and 1/4 of the sliced apples
